plays.text: Penalty to Joe Juneau 2 minutes for High Sticking Mario Lemieux
Penalty to Milan Kraft 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Sergei Berezin
Penalty to Doug Gilmour 2 minutes for Interference Aleksey Morozov
Penalty to Darius Kasparaitis 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Shaun Van Allen assisted by Richard Zednik and Andrei Markov
Penalty to Stephane Quintal 2 minutes for Hooking Toby Petersen
Penalty to Michal Rozsival 2 minutes for Hooking Andreas Dackell
